channel.title: Haikus on Jake Van Alstyne
channel.description: Recent content in Haikus on Jake Van Alstyne

item.title: Movie
item.description: Watching a movie Without popcorn is not good It is very bad

item.title: Chris Bacon
item.description: We can talk about The haikus Chris bacon sir Any time you wish

item.title: Singing
item.description: Someone is singing In the middle of the night Outside my window

item.title: Earthquakes
item.description: The earth shakes at times It is most unwelcome here Among us earthlings

item.title: Blogs
item.description: Blogs have to be good If you want people to read People don’t read mine

item.title: Food
item.description: My girlfriend makes food She learned this art in China It tastes like Chinese

item.title: Virus
item.description: Is it a virus If it doesn’t go viral And other questions

item.title: Wasting time
item.description: I like wasting time And I like wasting your time I did it again

item.title: Haiku
item.description: This is a haiku It checks all of the boxes And now it is done

item.title: Beer
item.description: Beer is very good I drink it often for fun Including right now

item.title: Richard
item.description: Richard has nice breath I wish he could write good code But alas he can’t

item.title: Typos from old books
item.description: A piecture is just A pie chart of types of pie In Antarctica

item.title: Ramen
item.description: Ramen is so good It has noodles, pork, and stuff To stuff in my face

item.title: Denver
item.description: I am in Denver It is just like Salt Lake City Except, like, bigger

item.title: In defense of the new MacBook Pro touchbar
item.description: It is a fun way To do things you did before Why not something new?

item.title: Getting out of bed
item.description: No no no no no No no no no no no no No no no no no

item.title: Waking up
item.description: Nope, nope, nope, nope, nope Nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope Nope, nope, nope, nope, nope

item.title: Space-time
item.description: Time and space are one So it is all relative Please pardon the pun

item.title: Evening
item.description: In the evening I am joined by Page and Plant but do not ascend

item.title: Breakfast
item.description: The first and best meal Forget brunch, breakfast is good enough to eat twice

item.title: Chairs
item.description: Made of good hard wood Sitting straight is important If you like your spine

item.title: Bubbles
item.description: Bubbles down the drain Remind me I am one too One day I will pop

item.title: Music
item.description: Listen to music From Mozart to the Beatles Feel infinity
